title: MY 12 GAME LOSING STREAK IS OVER
body:
REJOICE MY FRIENDS
I HAVE FINALLY GOTTEN RID OF IT

replies.body:
Congrats!!!

Dude, I'm on a massive streak. Doing myself proud.

Plat IV to Gold III.

OH MY GOD WOW!
YOU SHOULD TRY PLAY SOME NO SKILL CHAMPS TO GET OUT OF YOUR LOSING STREAK
IT WORKS!
yi and ww are some great examples!

Yi and Warwick no-skill champs?

Hah! Do you know how complex Warwick is... HAHAHAHA! SORRY, COULDN'T KEEP IT STRAIGHT.

Whenever I see someone play Warwick, I actually feel the slightest bit sorry for them. You got to be a bit dumb to have fun using that Champion.
